GIV.NYC 2015 GivingTuesday, Live from NYC December 1 is #GivingTuesday,?a Global Celebration of Giving.? GIV.NYC ?is #GivingTuesday in? New York City .? Watch our video . Join us on December 1  for a wonderful evening of making a difference - at the style and speed of NYC. ? Enjoy yourself while connecting with representatives from nonprofits, philanthropists, corporate leaders, and volunteers in a salon-style atmosphere.? Together, we'll?watch ten causes share their missions, then cast our votes to help determine the winners.? Your admission ticket ? will go towards the $20,000 in grants rewarded to the finalist. Plus, there will be  music and dancing, delicious refreshments, and an open bar.  ? Featuring  DJ Phi Unit  from the nonprofit DJ school, Building Beats. Gourmet cuisine from  Jack's Sushi and Sliders Exquisite wine from  One Hope Wine  and craft beers from a local brewery Make sure to get your spot early, buy your tickets? TODAY!
